Listed below is a unique opportunity we have to weigh in on the future of our community, while also earning funds for our school.

This fall, Envision Utah is helping Utah Valley residents and stakeholders create a vision for the future as we add nearly 1 million people to our population over the next 50 years. This effort ‚Äì called Valley Visioning ‚Äì has culminated into the Valley Visioning Survey.

The survey gives Utah Valley residents the chance to weigh in on growth-related issues important to our future. It will serve as the foundation for a vision with specific strategies which will help ensure Utah Valley remains a great place to call home, now and in the future. The survey is also a good chance for individuals to get support for their specific school.

Please take the survey and type in your school‚Äôs name at the end. For every survey completed by a parent, teacher, or student (13 years or older), Ancestry and Adobe (in partnership with Envision Utah) have agreed to donate $1.50 to your school.
